Class Space

java.lang.Object
  Space
Direct Known Subclasses:
Empty, Entrance, Hold, HoldQ, JStack, Maze, PriorityHold, TreasurePotA, TreasurePotB, TreasurePotC
abstract class Space
extends Object

Spaces Class. An abstract class that will provide structure for all classes below it.

Version:
March 4, 2016
Author:
Benjamin Draves
